text: @MattHancock I am the sales manager of the COVID-19 rapid test reagent company. I can provide large quantities of PCR and IgM / IgG Antibody Test. The certification is complete and can be exported to the world. If you need it, you can contact the mailbox: guoqiang@testkit.ltd
